name: Webamps Remove Double Menu
author: Webamp

sections.description:
This plugin removes the the desktop menu on mobile and removes the mobile menu on desktop using javascript. This overall provides better Seo.

A brief Markdown Example

Ordered list:

  1. Makes sure that only one menu is present at all times.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. All done.
sections.faq:
Do i need Jquery?

No.

Can I change the script?

Yes, it’s very easy.

short_description: Removes the double menu that yootheme provided.
